amendment.description: To provide a $40 million increase in FY 2007 for the Homeless Veterans Reintegration Program and to improve job services for hard-to-place veterans.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3144 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3144 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Obama. (consideration: CR S2261-2262; text: CR S2261) To provide a $40 million increase in FY 2007 for the Homeless Veterans Reintegration Program and to improve job services for hard-to-place veterans.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3144 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3144 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Obama.
